articles.title: Trump says his voters loved the Venezuela attack — here’s what they really think - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump promised that “America First” would stand against more foreign entanglements. Yet he's intervened with force and without congressional approval in a new frontier, with the U.S. seizure of Venezuela’s authoritarian leader, Nicolás Maduro…
articles.content: Its only been days since an audacious U.S. raid snatched Nicolás Maduro from a Venezuelan military base and sped him to a Brooklyn prison, yet Detroit-area Trump supporter Aaron Tobin can already see… [+8372 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Pope Leo XIV closes 2025 Holy Year with critique of consumerism and xenophobia - NBC News
articles.description: Pope Leo XIV on Tuesday closed out the Vatican’s 2025 Holy Year by denouncing today’s consumerist and anti-foreigner sentiment, capping a Jubilee that saw some 33 million pilgrims flock to Rome and a historic transition to the first American pontiff
